Package game.match

Class CanBet

java.lang.Object
game.match.State
game.match.CanBet
public class CanBet
extends State
Class CanBet represents a state, in which the legal commands are: bet (b), credit ($) and statistics (s).
Author:
Miguel Carvalho, Filipe Ferraz, Joao Baptista
